00047 
00048  PROGRAM main
00049 
00050 ! Common Variables
00051  USE Domain,      ONLY : iStep, MaxStep, now, nxt, RelaxStep, tDump, tStat
00052  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eps, pConv
00053  IMPLICIT NONE
00054 
00055 
00056 ! Read input parameters, allocate memory for common arrays and initialize
00057  CALL Parameters
00058  CALL MemAlloc(1)
00059  CALL Init
00060 
00061 ! Main iteration loop
00062  DO iStep = 1, MaxStep
00063 
00064 ! Full Step for momentum
00065    CALL CollisionG
00066    CALL Update
00067 
00068 ! Fractional Step 1 for order parameter
00069    CALL CollisionF
00070    CALL Stream
00071    CALL Differentials
00072 
00073 ! Fractional Step 2 for order parameter
00074    CALL CollisionF
00075    CALL Stream
00076    CALL Differentials
00077 
00078 ! Update momentum mesh index
00079    now = 1 - now
00080    nxt = 1 - nxt
00081 
00082 ! Save data if required
00083    IF ( MOD(istep,tStat) == 0 ) CALL Stats
00084    IF ( MOD(istep,tDump) == 0 ) CALL VtkPlane
00085 
00086 ! Test pressure convergence
00087    IF ( eps < pConv ) EXIT
00088 
00089  END DO
00090  RelaxStep = iStep - 1
00091 
00092 ! Save final data
00093  CALL VtkPlane
00094  CALL FinalDump
00095 
00096 ! Free memory
00097  CALL MemAlloc(2)
00098 
00099 
00100 END PROGRAM
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:35 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
